text: Clémentine Valverde (born September 23, 1992 in Longjumeau) is a French water polo player. She was selected for the France team in 2010. She participated at the 2013 Summer Universiade. Clémentine Valverde was twice winner of the Coupe de France with the ASPTT Nancy water polo. She then joined the Olympic Nice Natation where she won the Championship. == References == == Other websites == * CLEMENTINE VALVERDE, espritbleu.franceolympique.com * https://globalsportsarchive.com/people/water_polo/clementine-valverde/264865/ Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:French water polo players Category:People from Essonne Category:Sportspeople from Île-de-France
title: Clémentine Valverde
